actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to prohibit the transmission of electric energy into any State which enacts a law or regulation prohibiting the production of electric energy or atomic energy in such State, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Prohibits, under the Federal Power Act, the transmission of electric energy into any State which enacts a law or regulation prohibiting the production of electric energy or atomic energy in such State.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to prohibit the transmission of electric energy into any State which enacts a law or regulation prohibiting the production of electric energy or atomic energy in such State, and for other purposes.
